data.description: After investigating a abandoned research complex on a ice planet. Lister, Cat and Kryten returns to Red Dwarf only to find Rimmer has been infected with a electronic virus and he has taken over Red Dwarf and Lister, Cat and Kryten have been sentenced to Quarantine for three months.                Written byDaniel Williamson

donation.message: Please, donate to keep this service alive and help its further development
